channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Kentucky watches for surging rivers to recede so widespread cleanup can begin
item.description: After days of deluges overfilled rivers to near-record levels across Kentucky, residents are anxious to return to their flooded homes and assess what is salvageable.

item.title: Outrage builds as video shows Idaho police shooting a knife-wielding autistic teenager
Trump administration halts $1 billion in federal funding for Cornell, $790 million for Northwestern
